120 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLIGuiMonSel (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
121 {
122  MmwDemo_GuiMonSel guiMonSel;
123 
124  /* Sanity Check: Minimum argument check */
125  if (argc != 7)
126  {
127  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid usage of the CLI command\n");
128  return -1;
129  }
130 
131  /* Initialize the ADC Output configuration: */
132  memset ((void *)&guiMonSel, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_GuiMonSel));
133 
134  /* Populate configuration: */
135  guiMonSel.detectedObjects = atoi (argv[1]);
136  guiMonSel.logMagRange = atoi (argv[2]);
137  guiMonSel.noiseProfile = atoi (argv[3]);
138  guiMonSel.rangeAzimuthHeatMap = atoi (argv[4]);
139  guiMonSel.rangeDopplerHeatMap = atoi (argv[5]);
140  guiMonSel.statsInfo = atoi (argv[6]);
141 
142  /* Save Configuration to use later */
143  memcpy((void *)&gMmwMCB.cliCfg.guiMonSel, (void *)&guiMonSel, sizeof(MmwDemo_GuiMonSel));
144  return 0;
145 }

162 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLICfarCfg (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
163 {
164  MmwDemo_CfarCfg cfarCfg;
165 
166  /* Sanity Check: Minimum argument check */
167  if (argc != 8)
168  {
169  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid usage of the CLI command\n");
170  return -1;
171  }
172 
173  /* Initialize the ADC Output configuration: */
174  memset ((void *)&cfarCfg, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_CfarCfg));
175 
176  /* Populate configuration: */
177  //procDirection = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[1]);
178  cfarCfg.averageMode = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[2]);
179  cfarCfg.winLen = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[3]);
180  cfarCfg.guardLen = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[4]);
181  cfarCfg.noiseDivShift = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[5]);
182  cfarCfg.cyclicMode = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[6]);
183  cfarCfg.thresholdScale = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[7]);
184 
185  /* Save Configuration to use later */
186  memcpy((void *)&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.cliCfg->cfarCfg, (void *)&cfarCfg, sizeof(MmwDemo_CfarCfg));
187  return 0;
188 }

206 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLIPeakGroupingCfg (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
207 {
208  MmwDemo_PeakGroupingCfg peakGroupingCfg;
209 
210  /* Sanity Check: Minimum argument check */
211  if (argc != 6)
212  {
213  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid usage of the CLI command\n");
214  return -1;
215  }
216 
217  /* Initialize the ADC Output configuration: */
218  memset ((void *)&peakGroupingCfg, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_PeakGroupingCfg));
219 
220  /* Populate configuration: */
221  peakGroupingCfg.scheme = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[1]);
222  peakGroupingCfg.inRangeDirectionEn = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[2]);
223  peakGroupingCfg.inDopplerDirectionEn = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[3]);
224  peakGroupingCfg.minRangeIndex = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[4]);
225  peakGroupingCfg.maxRangeIndex = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[5]);
226 
227  if (peakGroupingCfg.scheme != 1 && peakGroupingCfg.scheme != 2)
228  {
229  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid peak grouping scheme\n");
230  return -1;
231  }
232 
233  /* Save Configuration to use later */
234  memcpy((void *)&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.cliCfg->peakGroupingCfg, (void *)&peakGroupingCfg,
235  sizeof(MmwDemo_PeakGroupingCfg));
236 
237  return 0;
238 }

296 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLICalibDcRangeSig (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
297 {
298  MmwDemo_CalibDcRangeSigCfg cfg;
299  uint32_t log2NumAvgChirps;
300 
301  /* Sanity Check: Minimum argument check */
302  if (argc != 5)
303  {
304  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid usage of the CLI command\n");
305  return -1;
306  }
307 
308  /* Initialize the ADC Output configuration: */
309  memset ((void *)&cfg, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_CalibDcRangeSigCfg));
310 
311  /* Populate configuration: */
312  cfg.enabled = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[1]);
313  cfg.negativeBinIdx = (int16_t) atoi (argv[2]);
314  cfg.positiveBinIdx = (int16_t) atoi (argv[3]);
315  cfg.numAvgChirps = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[4]);
316 
317  if (cfg.negativeBinIdx > 0)
318  {
319  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid negative bin index\n");
320  return -1;
321  }
322  if ((cfg.positiveBinIdx - cfg.negativeBinIdx + 1) > DC_RANGE_SIGNATURE_COMP_MAX_BIN_SIZE)
323  {
324  CLI_write ("Error: Number of bins exceeds the limit\n");
325  return -1;
326  }
327  log2NumAvgChirps = (uint32_t) log2Approx (cfg.numAvgChirps);
328  if (cfg.numAvgChirps != (1 << log2NumAvgChirps))
329  {
330  CLI_write ("Error: Number of averaged chirps is not power of two\n");
331  return -1;
332  }
333 
334  /* Save Configuration to use later */
335  memcpy((void *)&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.cliCfg->calibDcRangeSigCfg, (void *)&cfg,
336  sizeof(MmwDemo_CalibDcRangeSigCfg));
337  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.dcRangeSigCalibCntr = 0;
338  gMmwMCB.dataPathObj.log2NumAvgChirps = log2NumAvgChirps;
339 
340  return 0;
341 }
342

440 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLISensorStart (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
441 {
442 
443  bool doReconfig = true;
444  if (argc==2)
445  {
446  doReconfig = (bool) atoi (argv[1]);
447  }
448  /* Notify the sensor management module to start the sensor */
449  MmwDemo_notifySensorStart (doReconfig);
450  /* Pend for completion */
451  return (MmwDemo_waitSensorStartComplete());
452 }
453 
454 
470 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLISensorStop (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
471 {
472  /* Notify the sensor management module to stop the sensor */
473  MmwDemo_notifySensorStop ();
474  /* Pend for completion */
475  MmwDemo_waitSensorStopComplete();
476 
477  return 0;
478 }
479 
495 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLICompRangeBiasAndRxChanPhaseCfg (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
496 {
497  MmwDemo_compRxChannelBiasCfg_t cfg;
498  int32_t Re, Im;
499  int32_t argInd;
500  int32_t i;
501 
502  /* Sanity Check: Minimum argument check */
503  if (argc != (1+1+SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS*SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL*2))
504  {
505  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid usage of the CLI command, argc = %d, actual = %d \n", argc, (1+1+SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS*SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL*2));
506  return -1;
507  }
508 
509  /* Initialize configuration: */
510  memset ((void *)&cfg, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_compRxChannelBiasCfg_t));
511 
512  /* Populate configuration: */
513  cfg.rangeBias = (float) atof (argv[1]);
514 
515  argInd = 2;
516  for (i=0; i < SYS_COMMON_NUM_TX_ANTENNAS*SYS_COMMON_NUM_RX_CHANNEL; i++)
517  {
518  Re = (int32_t) (atof (argv[argInd++]) * 32768.);
519  Re = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_HIGH(Re);
520  Re = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_LOW(Re);
521  cfg.rxChPhaseComp[i].real = (int16_t) Re;
522 
523  Im = (int32_t) (atof (argv[argInd++]) * 32768.);
524  Im = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_HIGH(Im);
525  Im = MMWDEMO_SATURATE_LOW(Im);
526  cfg.rxChPhaseComp[i].imag = (int16_t) Im;
527 
528  }
529  /* Save Configuration to use later */
530  memcpy((void *) &gMmwMCB.cliCommonCfg.compRxChanCfg, &cfg, sizeof(MmwDemo_compRxChannelBiasCfg_t));
531 
532  return 0;
533 }
534 
551 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLIMeasureRangeBiasAndRxChanPhaseCfg (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
552 {
553  MmwDemo_measureRxChannelBiasCfg_t cfg;

559  return -1;
560  }
561 
562  /* Initialize configuration: */
563  memset ((void *)&cfg, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_measureRxChannelBiasCfg_t));
564 
565  /* Populate configuration: */
566  cfg.enabled = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[1]);
567  cfg.targetDistance = (float) atof (argv[2]);
568  cfg.searchWinSize = (float) atof (argv[3]);
569 
570  /* Save Configuration to use later */
571  memcpy((void *) &gMmwMCB.cliCommonCfg.measureRxChanCfg, &cfg, sizeof(MmwDemo_measureRxChannelBiasCfg_t));
572 
573  return 0;
574 }

592 static int32_t MmwDemo_CLIChirpQualityRxSatMonCfg (int32_t argc, char* argv[])
593 {
594  rlRxSatMonConf_t cqSatMonCfg;
595 
596  /* Sanity Check: Minimum argument check */
597  if (argc != 6)
598  {
599  CLI_write ("Error: Invalid usage of the CLI command\n");
600  return -1;
601  }
602 
603  /* Initialize configuration: */
604  memset ((void *)&cqSatMonCfg, 0, sizeof(rlRxSatMonConf_t));
605 
606  /* Populate configuration: */
607  cqSatMonCfg.profileIndx = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[1]);
608 
609  if(cqSatMonCfg.profileIndx >= RL_MAX_PROFILES_CNT)
610  return -1;
611 
612  cqSatMonCfg.satMonSel = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[2]);
613  cqSatMonCfg.primarySliceDuration = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[3]);
614  cqSatMonCfg.numSlices = (uint16_t) atoi (argv[4]);
615  cqSatMonCfg.rxChannelMask = (uint8_t) atoi (argv[5]);
616 
617  /* Save Configuration to use later */
618  memcpy((void *) &gMmwMCB.cliCommonCfg.cqSatMonCfg[cqSatMonCfg.profileIndx],
619  &cqSatMonCfg,
620  sizeof(rlRxSatMonConf_t));
621  return 0;
622 }

699 
708 void MmwDemo_CLIInit (void)
709 {
710  CLI_Cfg cliCfg;
711  uint32_t cnt = 0;
712  char demoBanner[256];
713 
714  /* Create Demo Banner to be printed out by CLI */
715  sprintf(&demoBanner[0],
716  "******************************************\n" \
717  "xWR14xx MMW Demo %02d.%02d.%02d.%02d\n" \
718  "******************************************\n",
719  MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_MAJOR,
720  MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_MINOR,
721  MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_BUGFIX,
722  MMWAVE_SDK_VERSION_BUILD
723  );
724 
725 
726  /* Initialize the CLI configuration: */
727  memset ((void *)&cliCfg, 0, sizeof(CLI_Cfg));
728 
729  /* Populate the CLI configuration: */
730  cliCfg.cliPrompt = "mmwDemo:/>";
731  cliCfg.cliBanner = demoBanner;
732  cliCfg.cliUartHandle = gMmwMCB.commandUartHandle;
733  cliCfg.taskPriority = 3;
734  cliCfg.enableMMWaveExtension = 1U;
735  cliCfg.usePolledMode = true;
736  cliCfg.mmWaveHandle = gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle;
737  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "sensorStart";
738 #if 0
739  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "[doReconfig(optional, default:enabled)]";
740 #else
741  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
742 #endif
743  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLISensorStart;
744  cnt++;
745 
746  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "sensorStop";
747 #if 0
748  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "No arguments";
749 #else
750  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
751 #endif
752  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLISensorStop;
753  cnt++;
754 
755  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "guiMonitor";
756 #if 0
757  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<detectedObjects> <logMagRange> <noiseProfile> <rangeAzimuthHeatMap> <rangeDopplerHeatMap> <statsInfo>";
758 #else
759  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
760 #endif
761  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIGuiMonSel;
762  cnt++;
763 
764  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "cfarCfg";
765 #if 0
766  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<procDirection> <averageMode> <winLen> <guardLen> <noiseDiv> <cyclicMode> <thresholdScale>";
767 #else
768  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
769 #endif
770  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLICfarCfg;
771  cnt++;
772 
773  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "peakGrouping";
774 #if 0
775  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<groupingMode> <rangeDimEn> <dopplerDimEn> <startRangeIdx> <endRangeIdx>";
776 #else
777  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
778 #endif
779  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIPeakGroupingCfg;
780  cnt++;
781 
782  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "multiObjBeamForming";
783 #if 0
784  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<enabled> <threshold>";
785 #else
786  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
787 #endif
788  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIMultiObjBeamForming;
789  cnt++;
790 
791  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "calibDcRangeSig";
792 #if 0
793  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<enabled> <negativeBinIdx> <positiveBinIdx> <numAvgFrames>";
794 #else
795  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
796 #endif
797  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLICalibDcRangeSig;
798  cnt++;
799 
800  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "clutterRemoval";
801 #if 0
802  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<enabled>";
803 #else
804  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
805 #endif
806  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIClutterRemoval;
807  cnt++;
808 
809  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "adcbufCfg";
810 #if 0
811  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<adcOutputFmt> <SampleSwap> <ChanInterleave> <ChirpThreshold>";
812 #else
813  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
814 #endif
815  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIADCBufCfg;
816  cnt++;
817 
818  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "compRangeBiasAndRxChanPhase";
819 #if 0
820  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<rangeBias> <Re00> <Im00> <Re01> <Im01> <Re02> <Im02> <Re03> <Im03> <Re10> <Im10> <Re11> <Im11> <Re12> <Im12> <Re13> <Im13> ";
821 #else
822  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
823 #endif
824  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLICompRangeBiasAndRxChanPhaseCfg;
825  cnt++;
826 
827  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "measureRangeBiasAndRxChanPhase";
828 #if 0
829  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<enabled> <targetDistance> <searchWin>";
830 #else
831  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
832 #endif
833  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIMeasureRangeBiasAndRxChanPhaseCfg;
834  cnt++;
835 
836  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "CQRxSatMonitor";
837 #if 0
838  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<profile> <satMonSel> <priSliceDuration> <numSlices> <rxChanMask>";
839 #else
840  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
841 #endif
842  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIChirpQualityRxSatMonCfg;
843  cnt++;
844 
845  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "CQSigImgMonitor";
846 #if 0
847  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<profile> <numSlices> <numSamplePerSlice>";
848 #else
849  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
850 #endif
851  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIChirpQualitySigImgMonCfg;
852  cnt++;
853 
854  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmd = "analogMonitor";
855 #if 0
856  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = "<rxSaturation> <sigImgBand>";
857 #else
858  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].helpString = NULL;
859 #endif
860  cliCfg.tableEntry[cnt].cmdHandlerFxn = MmwDemo_CLIAnalogMonitorCfg;
861 
862  /* Open the CLI: */
863  if (CLI_open (&cliCfg) < 0)
864  {
865  //System_printf ("Error: Unable to open the CLI\n");
866  MmwDemo_debugAssert (0);
867  return;
868  }
869  return;
870 }
